title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1945
medium: Pen and black ink, white chalk, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 377
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: VASE; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/45.; center right: FIL TORSADE [twisted bands].
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Wide bowl raised on a tall base decorated with two twisted coiled springs. Underdrawing in graphite of vase in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1945.
1945. Pen and black ink, white chalk, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-21.
